description:
A natural, multi-purpose soap to clean your skin, hair, dog, clothes, and camp dishes. Its concentrated formula means you only need a few drops, making it travel-friendly and light in the backpack.

  • 100% of the ingredients are of natural origin, biodegradable, and phosphate-free
  • 12.5% of the ingredients are organically grown
  • Pleasant odour with no citronella
name: Druide Ecotrail Multi-Purpose Soap 125ml
